name: Alberto Gonzales
summary: Former Attorney General under George W. Bush who endorsed Kamala Harris, saying Trump 'has little respect for the Constitution' and has 'crossed many lines.'

keyStatements.quote: Trump has little respect for the Constitution and has crossed many, many lines that are troubling. It's very clear he doesn't have the temperament to serve as President of the United States.
I'm endorsing Kamala Harris for President. This is not a decision I make lightly, but it's one I make based on deep concerns about where Donald Trump would take our country.

credibility.background: Former U.S. Attorney General, White House Counsel, first Hispanic to serve as Attorney General

oppositionReasons: Trump has little respect for the Constitution
Trump has crossed many troubling lines
Trump doesn't have the temperament to serve as president
Trump would take the country in dangerous direction
endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024

sources.title: List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
